page.title: 08Harbertonford Village 2
page.content:
The village church is dedicated to St. Peter. It is not of particular architectural interest though it does have a nice spire.
As in many rural communities the church is still considered an important aspect of life and the number of people regularly attending church is quite large. There is also a Bible study class and a Sunday School.
The parish is linked with Harberton, and it is here that the vicar lives.
I go to Sunday School nearly every Sunday but not many of my friends go. Sometimes it is quite good.
